name: Gentlemen Behold
description:
Gentlemen Behold it's a small game for the 2017 Unofficial GameBoy Jam. You have to explore the Forbington Manor, in order to collect two keys and find the way out.

It's a simple platformer game, no enemies, the only difficulties are classic and simple platformer puzzles. No big deal.

But you can behold pictures of wonderful people!
